page.title: 20Attitudes
page.content: As a result of our interviews we discovered that most of those recently moved into the area did so because of employment opportunities within the Aberdeen catchment area. They decided to live in Inverurie because of ease of access to work and because our area offers a pleasant, healthy living environment. Many of these people had previously lived in high density housing areas and therefore appreciated the unpolluted air and open countryside. There is still however a small nucleus of original inhabitants. Most of these people enjoy meeting and conversing with newcomers but are regretting the disappearance of the local dialect and are sorry that what was previously a close knit community is rapidly becoming a dormitory town.
